transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People sit inside me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I'm often parked in a garage.
🛣️ I help you travel long distances.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families often ride in me.

transport.question: I float on the water and can take you to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm very big and strong.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.
🗣️ Pirates used to sail on me

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might use me in a park.
🪖 You need a helmet when using me.
💪 You must push with your feet to move.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ You can travel very far with me.
🛬 I land at an airport.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ You can find me at a train station.
🚏I stop at each station to let passengers get on and off.
🚂 I go 'Choo choo!'

transport.question: I am big and yellow, and I take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights and a stop sign.
🎒 You get on me in the morning.
👦 I'm full of kids going to school.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights. I help people in an emergency. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise when I am rushing to help someone.
🧑‍⚕️ I take people to the hospital.
🤕 I help people when they are sick or hurt.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky but I'm not an airplane. I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🌆 I am smaller than an airplane.
🚑 Sometimes I can be an air ambulance!

transport.question: I help firefighters put out fires with water. I have a long hose. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am red and loud.
🧑‍🚒 I am driven by firefighters.
🔥 I spray water to stop big fires!

transport.question: I take you to space, far away from Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast and powerful.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I travel beyond the moon.

animal.question: I meow and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I say 'meow'.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I protect your house.
🗣️ I say 'woof'.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I like to swim in ponds.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🐥 I have baby ducklings

animal.question: I moo and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌱 I eat grass.
🥛 You can drink what I produce with your cereal

animal.question: I hop and have big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I can jump very high.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I eat meat.
🐾 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I like to peel my food.
🐾 I can make silly faces.

animal.question: I'm a large grey animal with a trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I have big ears.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
💧 I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🌊 I live in saltwater.
🦷 You don't want to get too close to my mouth!

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide from predators.
🌱 I am a herbivore
🐾 I look a bit like a horse.
